import {useState} from 'react' import '../css/login.css' import axios from 'axios' import {useHistory} from 'react-router-dom' function Register(props) { const[phone,setPhone] =useState('') const[name,setName] =useState('') const [Picture,setPicture] =useState() const history=useHistory(); /*get user information and token from DB*/ async function handleSubmit(e) { e.preventDefault() const formData= new FormData(); formData.append('file',Picture) const fileResponse =await axios.post("http://localhost:5000/api/logIn/AddProfilePic",formData,{headers: { 'Content-Type': 'multipart/form-data'}}) const {fileName,filePath} =fileResponse.data let picturePath ='uploads/'+fileName let obj = {name: name,phone: phone,imageName:picturePath,contacts:[],LastSeen:'last seen at...'} const response = await axios.post("http://localhost:5000/api/logIn/Register",obj) if(response.data.status ==200) { sessionStorage['config']= response.data.token sessionStorage['id'] = response.data.User._id sessionStorage['name'] = response.data.User.name props.CanLogIn(response.data.User._id) history.push('/App') } else console.log('not gooddd') } function handleFileUpload(e) { setPicture(e.target.files[0]) } return (
